**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 208 1.1 **Archetype** [Medic](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=257) **Prerequisites** [Battle Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=5125); Trained in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42) --- You become an expert in [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=42). When you succeed with [Battle Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=5125) or [Treat Wounds](/Actions.aspx?ID=2399), the target gains a circumstance bonus to the number of Hit Points they regain equal to 5 HP at DC 20, 10 HP at DC 30, or 15 HP at DC 40.
Once per day, you can use Battle Medicine on a creature that’s temporarily immune due to having already been treated with Battle Medicine. If you’re a master in Medicine, you can do so once per hour. Medic Dedication leads to... [Doctor's Visitation](/Feats.aspx?ID=6374), [Resuscitate](/Feats.aspx?ID=6377), [Treat Condition](/Feats.aspx?ID=6375)
